author: agilliland
msg: fix for trailing slash issue with weblog urls.  we now consider all weblog urls that end with a "/" to be invalid and get a 404, except for the weblog index pages.  we also allow the weblog index pages to work without a trailing slash and then redirect them to the version with the trailing slash for consistency.

author: fuzzylogic
msg: DERBY-408: Make figure numbering in documentation sequential.
